interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Closer (Superbit Edition)
Review Date: 2012/08/27
Store: Julia Roberts  (Actor),     Jude Law  (Actor),     Mike Nichols  (Director, Producer)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    R    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Sony Pictures Home Entertainment, All Sony Pictures Titles
Product Description: ['A witty, romantic, and very dangerous love story about chance meetings, instant attractions, and casual betrayals. CLOSER is director Mike Nichols\' critically acclaimed look at four strangers - Julia Roberts, Jude Law, Natalie Portman and Clive Owen - with one thing in common: each other. Adaptedby Patrick Marber from his award-winning stage play, CLOSER "VIBRATES WITH EROTICISM, BRUISING LAUGHS, AND DYNAMIC PERFORMANCES. CLOSER IS A TRIUMPH!" - Peter Travers, ROLLING STONE']
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Drama', 'Format': 'AC-3, Closed-captioned, Color, Dolby, Dubbed, NTSC, DTS Surround Sound, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'John Calley, Carey Brokaw, Cocksure Entertainment; Columbia Pictures Industries, Inc., Julia Roberts, Clive Owen, Mike Nichols, Natalie Portman, Jude LawJohn Calley, Carey Brokaw, Cocksure Entertainment; Columbia Pictures Industries, Inc., Julia Roberts, Clive Owen, Mike Nichols, Natalie Portman, Jude Law  See more', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), English (DTS 5.1), Unqualified, French (Dolby Digital 2.0 Surround)', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 44 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.85:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Package Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.3 x 0.6 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': '043396048478', 'Director': 'Mike Nichols', 'Media Format': 'AC-3, Closed-captioned, Color, Dolby, Dubbed, NTSC, DTS Surround Sound, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 44 minutes', 'Release date': 'March 29, 2005', 'Actors': 'Julia Roberts, Jude Law, Natalie Portman, Clive Owen', 'Dubbed': 'French', 'Subtitles': 'English, French', 'Producers': 'Mike Nichols, John Calley, Carey Brokaw', 'Studio': 'Sony Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: I love this movie! I only bought it for 1 cent. Yes that's right 1 cent! And paid a few bucks for shipping and handling. It was in great condition, no scratches, it didn't skip at all. Love amazon. I highly recommend buying items on here. Never had a problem with anything I purchased.
Review Title: Gina
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests:** The user shows a strong preference for movies, specifically dramatic narratives that explore complex relationships and emotional dynamics. Their choice of a romantic drama indicates an affinity for storytelling that includes themes of attraction and betrayal.

- **Viewing Preferences:** Enjoys films with engaging character interactions and performances by well-known actors. The presence of both critical acclaim and an accomplished director suggests a preference for high-quality productions.

- **Purchasing Behavior:** The user demonstrates savvy shopping habits, as indicated by their delight in acquiring a movie for a very low cost. They express satisfaction with the product’s condition and overall shopping experience, suggesting value-consciousness.

- **Recommendation Habits:** The user is likely to recommend products they have had positive experiences with, highlighting the importance they place on quality and reliability in purchases.

- **Overall Experience:** The positive tone of the review indicates a generally optimistic outlook towards both the products and the purchasing platform, reflecting trust in their shopping experience. 

**Keywords:** Movies, Drama, Romantic, Relationships, Quality, Value-conscious, Positive experience, Recommendations.
